headline: Omnicom Declares Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Omnicom (NYSE: OMC) declared a quarterly dividend of 70 cents per outstanding share of the corporation's common stock. The dividend is payable on October 10, 2025 to Omnicom common shareholders of record at the close of business on September 2, 2025.

raw.headline: Omnicom Declares Dividend

headline: Omnicom and Interpublic Clear Australia Antitrust Review
summary: Omnicom (NYSE: OMC) and Interpublic (NYSE: IPG) today announced the Australia Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC) has granted clearance for Omnicom's pending acquisition of Interpublic.

raw.headline: Omnicom and Interpublic Clear Australia Antitrust Review
raw.summary: Omnicom (NYSE: OMC) and Interpublic (NYSE: IPG) today announced the Australia Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC) has granted clearance for Omnicom's pending acquisition of Interpublic.

headline: The MX Group Appoints Paul Hirsch as First Chief Creative Officer
summary: In a world where the B2B agency landscape is increasingly shaped by consolidation, The MX Group is taking a different path — expanding its leadership team to meet the demands of a more complex and customer-driven B2B environment. The independent B2B agency announced today that Paul Hirsch has joined as its first Chief Creative Officer, bringing senior-level creative expertise to fuel growth for an expanding roster of B2B clients.

headline: OMC Q1 Deep Dive: Market Uncertainty, Segment Divergence, and Interpublic Integration Loom
summary: Global advertising giant Omnicom Group (NYSE:OMC) reported Q2 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 4.2% year on year to $4.02 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.05 per share was 0.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Publicis Raises Outlook After Account Wins Propel Growth
summary: A string of major account wins has helped the advertising group ride out tariff concerns to beat analysts’ expectations for the second quarter.
